dmca.title: EyeWorld doesn't see fair use of editorial
dmca.body:
Please remove the editorial by Marguerite B. McDonald, MD, posted on your site at the following link:

http://www.lasikinfocenter.net/General%20Articles/Marguerite%20MacDonald%20-%20No%20One%20Wins%20Unless%20Everyone%20Wins.html 

This editorial is copyrighted, property of EyeWorld and ASCRS Ophthalmic Services Corp., which has not and will not grant consent to post the material on your website.

Your confirmation that the material has been removed would be appreciated.

[Private]
Executive Editor, EyeWorld
ASCRS/ASOA
Fairfax, VA 22033

                                                       
My Reply to Cease and Desist Request:

The following article gives the reader an idea of how some refractive surgeons think about their responsibilities to the public
